instructions: **Version:** 1.0This character sheet was originally made for **Maschinenleben** (released later this year), a fan product for the **Savage Worlds Adventure Edition** (SWADE) about cyborgs struggling with their loss of self. Due to its extensive build and customization options, it may be used for many other settings as well.#### Notable Features* Blocks for Powers, Vehicles, Power Armor, Allies, and more* Seamless switch to compact alternate version (for Extras)* Toggle/Rename skills and add up to two custom skills* Roll Templates for multiple dice (RoF 1-6) with custom Wild Die* Die results of [1] and [2] marked with colors (red or gray)* Minimalist design inspired by pencil on graph paper* Various options for styling, rules, functions, and renaming* Help section within the sheet (Settings > Help)#### Notes* Requires a mouse cursor to fully operate (hover)* Join the [support game](https://app.roll20.net/join/8488284/oQJGfg) for bug reports and requests---
